ds_abilities.name: Volley Fire
ds_abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of ranged weapons equipped by models in that unit.

ds_abilities.name: Crack Shot
ds_abilities.description: Each time this model makes a ranged attack, on a Critical Wound, that attack has an Armour Penetration characteristic of -3.

ds_abilities.name: Way of the Short Blade
ds_abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes an attack that targets an enemy unit within 9", add 1 to the  Wound roll.

ds_abilities.name: Puretide's Teachings
ds_abilities.description: Once per battle round, you can target this model’s unit with a Stratagem. If it does, reduce the CP cost of that use of that Stratagem by 1CP.

ds_abilities.name: Coldstar Commander
ds_abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have a Move characteristic of 12" and ranged weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [ASSAULT] ability.

ds_abilities.name: Battlesuit Support System
ds_abilities.description: The bearer’s unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back, but when doing so only models equipped with this wargear can make ranged attacks.

ds_abilities.name: Shield Generator
ds_abilities.description: The bearer has a 4+ invulnerable save.

ds_abilities.name: Weapon Support System
ds_abilities.description: Each time the bearer makes a ranged attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to the Hit roll.

ds_abilities.name: Enforcer Commander
ds_abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a ranged attack targets that unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

ds_abilities.name: Battlesuit Support System
ds_abilities.description: The bearer’s unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back, but when doing so only models equipped with this wargear can make ranged attacks.

ds_abilities.name: Shield Generator
ds_abilities.description: The bearer has a 4+ invulnerable save.

ds_abilities.name: Weapon Support System
ds_abilities.description: Each time the bearer makes a ranged attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to the Hit roll.

ds_abilities.name: Agile Combatant
ds_abilities.description: This model is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back.

ds_abilities.name: Hero of the Empire (Aura)
ds_abilities.description: While a friendly T’AU EMPIRE unit is within 6" of this model, each time a model in that unit makes a ranged attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1.

ds_abilities.name: Advanced Guardian Drone
ds_abilities.description: Each time a ranged attack targets the bearer, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

ds_abilities.name: Command-link Drone (Aura)
ds_abilities.description: While a friendly T’AU EMPIRE unit is within 6" of the bearer, each time you select that unit as the target of a Stratagem, roll one D6: on a 5+, you gain 1CP.

ds_abilities.name: Structural Analyser
ds_abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a ranged attack, add 1 to the Wound roll.

ds_abilities.name: Jammer Array
ds_abilities.description: Enemy units that are set up on the battlefield from Reserves cannot be set up within 12" of this model.

ds_abilities.name: Failure Is Not an Option
ds_abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability.

ds_abilities.name: Coordinated Leadership
ds_abilities.description: At the end of your Command phase, roll one D6: on a 4+, you gain 1CP.

ds_abilities.name: Precise Targeting
ds_abilities.description: While this model is a Guided unit, each time it makes an attack that targets its Spotted unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

ds_abilities.name: Advanced Scouting
ds_abilities.description: Each time this model makes a ranged attack that hits an enemy unit, until the end of the turn, each time another  KROOT model from your army makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

ds_abilities.name: Fire and Fade
ds_abilities.description: In your Shooting phase, after this model has shot, if it is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, it can make a Normal move of up to 6". If it does, until the end of the turn, this model is not eligible to declare a charge.

ds_abilities.name: Inspirational Defiance:
ds_abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in that unit.

ds_abilities.name: Martial Warrior:
ds_abilities.description: Each time this model is selected to fight, select one of the following abilities to be active while resolving those attacks:

ds_abilities.name: Direct Grace:
ds_abilities.description: Fidelity has the [PRECISION] ability.

ds_abilities.name: Forceful Strike:
ds_abilities.description: Fidelity has the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.

ds_abilities.name: Whirling Stance:
ds_abilities.description: Fidelity has the [SUSTAINED HITS 2] ability instead of [SUSTAINED HITS 1].

ds_abilities.name: Duality Shield
ds_abilities.description: Once per battle, each time an attack targets this unit, it can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, models in this unit have a 2+ invulnerable save.

ds_abilities.name: Paradox of Duality
ds_abilities.description: Each time an attack targets this unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll and subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

ds_abilities.name: Supreme Loyalty (Aura)
ds_abilities.description: While a friendly T’AU EMPIRE unit is within 6" of this unit, each time that unit takes a Battle-shock or Leadership test, add 1 to that test.

ds_abilities.name: Crisis Commander
ds_abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a ranged attack, re-roll a  Hit roll of 1.

ds_abilities.name: Armour Hunter
ds_abilities.description: Each time this model makes an attack that targets a MONSTER or VEHICLE, add 1 to the Hit roll.

ds_abilities.name: Targeting Array
ds_abilities.description: Each time this model is selected to shoot, you can re-roll one Hit roll or you can re-roll one Wound roll when resolving its attacks.

ds_abilities.name: XV02 Pilot Battlesuit
ds_abilities.description: In your Command phase, you can select one friendly HAMMERHEAD GUNSHIP unit within 12". Until the start of your next Command phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.

ds_abilities.name: Damaged: 1-5 WOUNDS REMAINING
ds_abilities.description: While this model has 1-5 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

ds_abilities.name: Eclipse Field Generator
ds_abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have a 5+ invulnerable save.

ds_abilities.name: Assassin
ds_abilities.description: Each time this model makes an attack that targets a Character unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

ds_abilities.name: Blacklight Marker Drones
ds_abilities.description: Twice per battle, when this unit is an Observer unit, until the end of the phase, each time a ranged attack is made by a model in their Guided unit that targets their Spotted unit, re-roll a Wound roll of 1.

ds_abilities.name: Breach and Clear:
ds_abilities.description: Each time a model in this unit makes a ranged attack that targets an enemy unit within range of an objective marker, you can re-roll the Wound roll.

ds_abilities.name: DS8 Support Turret:
ds_abilities.description: In your Movement phase, if this unit Remains Stationary, until the start of your next Movement phase, its Fire Warrior Shas’ui model is equipped with the support turret missile system weapon.

ds_abilities.name: Suppression Volley
ds_abilities.description: In your Shooting phase, after this unit has shot, select one enemy INFANTRY unit hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the start of your next turn, while this unit is on the battlefield, that enemy unit is suppressed. While a unit is suppressed, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

ds_abilities.name: DS8 Support Turret
ds_abilities.description: In your Movement phase, if this unit Remains Stationary, until the start of your next Movement phase, its Fire Warrior Shas’ui model is equipped with the support turret missile system weapon.

ds_abilities.name: Rapid Deployment
ds_abilities.description: Units can disembark from this TRANSPORT after it has Advanced. Units that do so count as having made a Normal move that phase, and cannot declare a charge in the same turn, but can otherwise act normally in the remainder of the turn.

ds_abilities.name: Droneport
ds_abilities.description: Each time this FORTIFICATION is selected to shoot, its drone defender’s weapon will target and resolve attacks against every enemy unit that is an eligible target to this FORTIFICATION.

ds_abilities.name: Fortification
ds_abilities.description: While an enemy unit is only within Engagement Range of one or more FORTIFICATIONS from your army: That unit can still be selected as the target of ranged attacks, but each time such an attack is made, unless it is made with a Pistol, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.  Models in that unit do not need to take Desperate Escape tests due to Falling Back while Battle-shocked, except for those that will move over enemy models when doing so.

ds_abilities.name: Tidewall Cover
ds_abilities.description: Each time a ranged attack is allocated to a model, if that model is not fully visible to every model in the attacking unit because of this Fortification, that model has the Benefit of Cover against that attack.

ds_abilities.name: Fortification:
ds_abilities.description: While an enemy unit is only within Engagement Range of one or more FORTIFICATIONS from your army: That unit can still be selected as the target of ranged attacks, but each time such an attack is made, unless it is made with a Pistol, subtract 1 from the Hit roll. Models in that unit do not need to take Desperate Escape tests due to Falling Back while Battle-shocked, except for those that will move over enemy models when doing so.

ds_abilities.name: Tidewall Cover:
ds_abilities.description: Each time a ranged attack is allocated to a model, if that model is not fully visible to every model in the attacking unit because of this FORTIFICATION, that model has the Benefit of Cover against that attack.

ds_abilities.name: Fortification
ds_abilities.description: While an enemy unit is only within Engagement Range of one or more FORTIFICATIONS from your army: That unit can still be selected as the target of ranged attacks, but each time such an attack is made, unless it is made with a Pistol, subtract 1 from the Hit roll. Models in that unit do not need to take Desperate Escape tests due to Falling Back while Battle-shocked, except for those that will move over enemy models when doing so.

ds_abilities.name: Tidewall Cover
ds_abilities.description: Each time a ranged attack is allocated to a model, if that model is not fully visible to every model in the attacking unit because of this FORTIFICATION, that model has the Benefit of Cover against that attack.

ds_abilities.name: Tidewall Defence Platform
ds_abilities.description: If equipped with a Tidewall defence platform, this FORTIFICATION has a Wounds characteristic of 15.

ds_abilities.name: Sentinel Protocols
ds_abilities.description: Each time you select this FORTIFICATION for the Fire Overwatch Stratagem, hits are scored on unmodified Hit rolls of 5+ when resolving that Stratagem.

ds_abilities.name: Reinforced Cover
ds_abilities.description: Each time a ranged attack is allocated to a model, if that model is not fully visible to every model in the attacking unit because of this FORTIFICATION, that model has the Benefit of Cover against that attack.

ds_abilities.name: Fortification
ds_abilities.description: While an enemy unit is only within Engagement Range of one or more FORTIFICATIONS from your army: That unit can still be selected as the target of ranged attacks, but each time such an attack is made, unless it is made with a Pistol, subtract 1 from the Hit roll. Models in that unit do not need to take Desperate Escape tests due to Falling Back while Battle-shocked, except for those that will move over enemy models when doing so.

ds_abilities.name: Orbital Comms Array (Aura):
ds_abilities.description: While a friendly T’AU EMPIRE unit is within 6" of this FORTIFICATION, each time you target that unit with a Stratagem, roll one D6: on a 5+, you gain 1CP.

ds_abilities.name: Reinforced Cover:
ds_abilities.description: Each time a ranged attack is allocated to a model, if that model is not fully visible to every model in the attacking unit because of this FORTIFICATION, that model has the Benefit of Cover against that attack.

ds_abilities.name: Fortification:
ds_abilities.description: While an enemy unit is only within Engagement Range of one or more FORTIFICATIONS from your army:  That unit can still be selected as the target of ranged attacks, but each time such an attack is made, unless it is made with a Pistol, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.  Models in that unit do not need to take Desperate Escape tests due to Falling Back while Battle-shocked, except for those that will move over enemy models when doing so.

core_abilities.name: Feel No Pain 4+
core_abilities.description: Models in this unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability against mortal wounds.

ds_abilities.name: Fireknife
ds_abilities.description: Each time a model in this unit makes a ranged attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1. If that attack targets a unit that is at its Starting Strength, you can re-roll the Hit roll instead.

ds_abilities.name: Weapon Support System
ds_abilities.description: Each time a model in this unit makes a ranged attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to the Hit roll.

ds_abilities.name: Starscythe
ds_abilities.description: Each time a model in this unit makes a ranged attack (excluding attacks that target MONSTERS and VEHICLES), improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

ds_abilities.name: Battlesuit Support System
ds_abilities.description: This unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back.

ds_abilities.name: Sunforge
ds_abilities.description: Each time a model in this unit makes a ranged attack that targets a MONSTER or VEHICLE unit, you can re-roll the Wound roll and you can re-roll the Damage roll.

ds_abilities.name: Stealth Drones:
ds_abilities.description: Twice per battle, after an attack has been allocated to this model, you can change the Damage characteristic of that attack to 0.

ds_abilities.name: Armour Hunter
ds_abilities.description: Each time this model makes an attack that targets a MONSTER or VEHICLE, add 1 to the Hit roll.

ds_abilities.name: Targeting Array
ds_abilities.description: Each time this model is selected to shoot, you can re-roll one Hit roll or you can re-roll one Wound roll when resolving those attacks.

ds_abilities.name: Damaged: 1-5 WOUNDS REMAINING
ds_abilities.description: While this model has 1-5 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

core_abilities.name: Fieldcraft
core_abilities.description: At the end of your Command phase, if this unit is within range of an objective marker you control, that objective marker remains under your control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn.

ds_abilities.name: Loping Pounce
ds_abilities.description: At the start of your Command phase, if this unit is within 6" of one or more friendly KROOT INFANTRY units, then until the end of the turn, this unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.

ds_abilities.name: Hunting Hounds
ds_abilities.description: While this unit is within 12" of one or more friendly KROOT CHARACTER models, the Objective Control characteristic of models in this unit is 1.

ds_abilities.name: Kroot Linebreakers
ds_abilities.description: Each time this unit ends a Charge move, select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of it, then roll one D6 for each model in this unit that is within Engagement Range of that enemy unit: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. If one or more enemy models are destroyed as a result of these mortal wounds, that enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test.

ds_abilities.name: Kroot Packmates:
ds_abilities.description: Once per turn, in your opponent’s Shooting phase , when a friendly KROOT INFANTRY unit within 6" of this unit is selected as the target of an attack, one unit from your army with this ability can use it. If it does, after that enemy unit has finished making its attacks, that unit with this ability can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but when resolving those attacks it can only target that enemy unit (and only if it is an eligible target).

faction_abilities.name: Target Uploaded
faction_abilities.description: Once per turn, when using the Greater Good ability, you can select this unit to be an Observer unit for a second time. When doing so, you can change which enemy unit is this unit’s Spotted unit.

ds_abilities.name: Drone Harassment Tactics
ds_abilities.description: At the end of your Movement phase, select one enemy unit within 12" of this unit; that enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test.

ds_abilities.name: Ground Strike Fighter
ds_abilities.description: Each time this model makes a ranged attack that targets an enemy unit that cannot FLY , add 1 to the Hit roll.

ds_abilities.name: DAMAGED: 1-4 WOUNDS REMAINING
ds_abilities.description: While this model has 1-4 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll .

ds_abilities.name: Battlesuit Support System
ds_abilities.description: The bearer is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back.

ds_abilities.name: Nova Charge
ds_abilities.description: Once per battle, when this unit is selected to shoot in your Shooting phase, select one ranged weapon equipped by this model. Until the end of the phase, that weapon has the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.

ds_abilities.name: Weapon Support System
ds_abilities.description: Each time the bearer makes a ranged attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to the Hit roll.

ds_abilities.name: Velocity Tracker
ds_abilities.description: Each time this model makes a ranged attack that targets a unit that can FLY, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

ds_abilities.name: Targeting Array
ds_abilities.description: Each time this unit is selected to shoot, you can re-roll one Hit roll or you can re-roll one Wound roll when resolving those attacks.

ds_abilities.name: DAMAGED: 1-5 WOUNDS REMAINING
ds_abilities.description: While this model has 1-5 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll .

faction_abilities.name: Forward Observers
faction_abilities.description: Each time this unit is an Observer unit, until the end of the phase, each time a ranged attack is made by a model in their Guided unit that targets their Spotted unit, re-roll a Hit roll of 1 and re-roll a Wound roll of 1.

ds_abilities.name: Battlesuit Support System
ds_abilities.description: The bearer’s unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back, but when doing so only models equipped with this wargear can make ranged attacks.

ds_abilities.name: Homing Beacon
ds_abilities.description: Once per battle, you can use the Rapid Ingress Stratagem for 0CP. The target must be set up within 3" of the bearer’s unit and not within 9" of any enemy units.

ds_abilities.name: Designer’s Note
ds_abilities.description: Place a Homing Beacon token next to this unit, removing it once this ability is used.

ds_abilities.name: Heavy Walker
ds_abilities.description: Each time this model makes a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move, it can move over models (excluding TITANIC models) and terrain features that are 4" or less in height as if they were not there.

ds_abilities.name: Support System
ds_abilities.description: Each time this model makes a ranged attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to the Hit roll.

ds_abilities.name: Titan-killer
ds_abilities.description: Each time this model makes a ranged attack that targets a TITANIC or TOWERING unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

ds_abilities.name: Pulse Bombs
ds_abilities.description: Each time this model ends a Normal move, you can select one enemy unit it moved over during that move and roll six D6: for each 4+, that unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

ds_abilities.name: Airborne Agility
ds_abilities.description: At the end of your opponent’s turn, if this unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, you can remove it from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

ds_abilities.name: Oversight Drone
ds_abilities.description: Once per battle, when the bearer’s unit is selected to shoot, until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in this unit have the [IGNORES COVER] ability.

ds_abilities.name: Titan Hunter
ds_abilities.description: This model’s twin heavy rail cannon and seeker missiles have the ANTI-TITANIC 3+ ability while targeting a unit within half range.

ds_abilities.name: DAMAGED: 1-6 WOUNDS REMAINING
ds_abilities.description: While this model has 1-6 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

ds_abilities.name: Aggressive Deployment
ds_abilities.description: In your Shooting phase, after this model has shot, select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the end of the phase, each time a friendly model that disembarked from this TRANSPORT this turn makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, you can re-roll the Wound roll.

ds_abilities.name: Air Caste Colossus
ds_abilities.description: Each time you target this model with a Stratagem, you must spend three times that Stratagem’s stated CP cost to do so.

ds_abilities.name: Coordinated Strike
ds_abilities.description: While this model is a Guided unit, each time it makes an attack that targets its Spotted unit, re-roll a Hit roll of 1.

ds_abilities.name: Super-heavy Walker
ds_abilities.description: Each time this model makes a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move, it can move over models (excluding TITANIC models) and terrain features that are 4" or less in height as if they were not there.

ds_abilities.name: Strafing Run
ds_abilities.description: In your Shooting phase, after this model has shot, select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks that cannot FLY. That enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test.

ds_abilities.name: Transport Bay
ds_abilities.description: The bearer has the TRANSPORT keyword and has a transport capacity of 12 TACTICAL DRONES models.

ds_abilities.name: DAMAGED: 1-6 WOUNDS REMAINING
ds_abilities.description: While this model has 1-6 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

ds_abilities.name: Agile Dogfighter
ds_abilities.description: Each time an attack targets this model, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

ds_abilities.name: DAMAGED: 1-5 WOUNDS REMAINING
ds_abilities.description: While this model has 1-5 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

ds_abilities.name: Turbo-jets
ds_abilities.description: Each time this unit Advances, do not make an Advance roll for it. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in this unit.

ds_abilities.name: Battlesuit Support System
ds_abilities.description: The bearer’s unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back, but when doing so only models equipped with this wargear can make ranged attacks.

ds_abilities.name: Shield Generator
ds_abilities.description: The bearer has a 4+ invulnerable save.

ds_abilities.name: Weapon Support System
ds_abilities.description: Each time the bearer makes a ranged attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to the Hit roll.

ds_abilities.name: Drone Escort:
ds_abilities.description: Once per turn, in your opponent’s Shooting phase , when a friendly T’AU EMPIRE unit within 6" of this unit is selected as the target of an attack, one unit from your army with this ability can use it. If it does, after that enemy unit has finished making its attacks, the unit using this ability can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but when resolving those attacks it can only target that enemy unit (and only if it is an eligible target).

ds_abilities.name: Markerlight:
ds_abilities.description: The bearer has the MARKERLIGHT keyword.

ds_abilities.name: Jet Pack Insertion
ds_abilities.description: At the end of your opponent’s Movement phase , one or more units embarked within this TRANSPORT can disembark from it, provided every model in each of those disembarking units has the Deep Strike ability.

ds_abilities.name: Battlesuit Support System
ds_abilities.description: This model is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back.

ds_abilities.name: Nova Shielding
ds_abilities.description: Once per battle, when this model is selected as the target of a ranged attack, it can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets this model, if the Strength characteristic of that attack is greater than the Toughness characteristic of this model, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

ds_abilities.name: Weapon Support System
ds_abilities.description: Each time this model makes a ranged attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to the Hit roll.

ds_abilities.name: Aerial Disengagement
ds_abilities.description: Once per turn, when an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move within 9" of this unit, if this unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, it can make a Normal move of up to 6".

ds_abilities.name: One Shot
ds_abilities.description: The bearer can only shoot with this weapon once per battle.

ds_abilities.name: High-intensity Markerlights
ds_abilities.description: Each time this unit is an Observer unit, until the end of the phase, each time a model in its Guided unit makes an attack that targets their Spotted unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

ds_abilities.name: Outflank
ds_abilities.description: When this unit arrives from Strategic Reserves, it can be set up within your opponent’s deployment zone (all other restrictions still apply).

faction_abilities.name: Photon Casters
faction_abilities.description: In your Shooting phase, after this unit has shot, if an enemy INFANTRY unit was hit by one or more of those attacks, until the end of your opponent’s next turn, that enemy unit is stunned. While a unit is stunned, subtract 2 from that unit’s Move characteristic, and subtract 2 from Advance and Charge rolls made for that unit.

ds_abilities.name: Battlesuit Support System
ds_abilities.description: The bearer’s unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back, but when doing so only models equipped with this wargear can make ranged attacks.

ds_abilities.name: Shield Generator
ds_abilities.description: The bearer has a 4+ invulnerable save.

ds_abilities.name: Weapon Support System
ds_abilities.description: Each time the bearer makes a ranged attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to the Hit roll.

ds_abilities.name: Battlesuit Support System
ds_abilities.description: This model is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back.

ds_abilities.name: Nova Burst
ds_abilities.description: Once per battle, before this model makes a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move, it can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, it has a Move characteristic of 18".

ds_abilities.name: Weapon Support System
ds_abilities.description: Each time this model makes a ranged attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to the Hit roll.
